ing: 2 tablespoons marshmallow cream (such as Marshmallow FluffÂ®)
n: Fatty Natty's Peanut Butter Fudge Balls
des: "Yummy chocolate-peanut butter balls! Melts in your mouth. Quick and easy! No baking required! Everyone loves them!"
ins: Mix confectioners' sugar, peanut butter, butter, cocoa powder, marshmallow creme, and vanilla extract together in a bowl until smooth. Roll mixture into 2-inch balls and place in a sealed container. Refrigerate until set, at least 30 minutes.
